original_title: Central Bank of Sri Lanka releases “Sri Lanka Socio-Economic Data – 2025”
original_body_lines: “Sri Lanka Socio-Economic Data – 2025”, the annually published data folder of the CBSL, is now available for public information. The current data folder is the 48th volume of the series.

This easy-to-carry booklet contains information categorised under 14 topics, namely, Country Profile; Key Economic Indicators; Country Comparisons; Socio-Economic Conditions; Human Resources; National Accounts; Agriculture; Industry; Economic and Social Infrastructure; Prices and Wages; External Trade and Tourism; External Finance; Government Finance; and Money, Banking and Finance. As the data folder presents a wide range of socio-economic data of current interest in a concise and summary form, it will serve as a useful publication for policymakers, researchers, academics, professionals, students and the general public.

The electronic version of the publication can be accessed through the Central Bank website ( https://www.cbsl.gov.lk/en/publications/other-publications/statistical-publications/sri-lanka-socio-economic-data-folder ).

Printed copies of the publication will be available for sale at Rs. 100/- at the Sales and Distribution Counter of the Central Bank, located at the Central Point Building (Chatham Street, Colombo 01), Tel: 011-2444502.
